app.title: GlobalRx Screening Platform
app.about.title: About GlobalRx
app.about.description1: GlobalRx is a modular platform used for conducting global screening, providing a comprehensive solution for user administration, configuration management, and candidate workflows.
app.about.description2: The platform consists of four independent modules: User Admin, Global Configurations, Customer Configurations, and Candidate Workflow, all accessible through a unified interface.
app.welcome.title: Welcome to GlobalRx
app.welcome.description: A comprehensive platform for global screening
app.welcome.signin: Please sign in using the button in the header to access the platform.
module.userAdmin.title: User Administration
module.globalConfig.title: Global Configurations
module.globalConfig.description: Manage locations, services, DSX, and translations
module.customerConfig.title: Customer Configurations
module.customerConfig.description: Manage customer accounts and service scopes
module.customerConfig.noUsersDescription: No users currently have access to this customer account.
module.candidateWorkflow.title: Candidate Workflow
module.candidateWorkflow.createWorkflowD: Create a new workflow for candidate data collection
module.candidateWorkflow.expirationDaysD: Number of days before the workflow expires
module.candidateWorkflow.extensionAllowe: Allow candidates to request time extensions
module.candidateWorkflow.extensionDaysDe: Maximum number of days for extensions
module.candidateWorkflow.reminderEnabled: Automatically send reminders to candidates to complete their applications
module.candidateWorkflow.reminderFrequen: Number of days between reminder notifications
module.candidateWorkflow.maxRemindersDes: Maximum number of reminders to send before giving up
module.candidateWorkflow.packageSelectio: A workflow can only be associated with one package.
module.candidateWorkflow.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this workflow?
common.name: Name
common.contactAdmin: Please contact your administrator for access
config.global.title: Global Configurations
config.global.description: Manage global settings including locations, services, DSX requirements, and translations for use across the GlobalRx platform.
config.locations.title: Locations Management
config.locations.description: Manage countries, regions, and subregions based on ISO standards.
config.services.title: Services Management
config.services.description: Manage the available services that can be offered to customers.
config.dsx.title: DSX Requirements
config.dsx.description: Define data fields and document requirements for specific searches by location.
translations.title: Translations Management
translations.description: Manage translations for all UI elements across the GlobalRx platform. Add new languages or edit existing translations.
locations.loadError: Failed to load locations. Please try again.
config.data-rx.title: Data Requirements (Data Rx)
config.data-rx.description: Create and manage data fields and documents that will be used to gather information from candidates.
config.data-rx.fields.empty: No data fields have been created yet. Click "Add Field" to create one.
config.data-rx.documents.empty: No documents have been created yet. Click "Add Document" to create one.
customer.configs.title: Customer Packages
module.candidateWorkflow.sectionDescript: Sections organize the workflow into logical steps for candidates to complete.
module.candidateWorkflow.sectionNameDesc: The name of this section as it will appear to candidates
module.candidateWorkflow.displayOrderDes: The order in which this section appears in the workflow (0 is first)
module.candidateWorkflow.requiredDescrip: If enabled, candidates must complete this section
module.candidateWorkflow.dependencyDescr: Optionally choose a section that must be completed before this one
module.candidateWorkflow.dependencyLogic: Specify when this section becomes available based on the dependency
module.candidateWorkflow.noSectionsDescr: This workflow doesn't have any sections yet. Sections help organize the candidate workflow into logical steps.
module.candidateWorkflow.confirmDeleteSe: Are you sure you want to delete this section?
module.candidateWorkflow.hasDependent: Other sections depend on this one
module.candidateWorkflow.cannotDelete: Cannot delete - other sections depend on this one
module.candidateWorkflow.noWorkflowSelec: No workflow selected. Please select a workflow.
module.candidateWorkflow.sectionTypeDesc: The type of content and functionality this section will provide
module.candidateWorkflow.textContentPlac: Enter the text content for this form or notice
module.candidateWorkflow.textContentDesc: The text content to display in this form or notice section
module.candidateWorkflow.requireSignatur: If enabled, the user must provide a signature
module.candidateWorkflow.requireCheckbox: If enabled, the user must check a box to acknowledge
module.candidateWorkflow.showIpAddressDe: If enabled, display and capture the user's IP address
module.candidateWorkflow.errors.ordering: This section type cannot be placed here due to ordering rules
